snippet: Several securities law experts say the delay in the BlackBerry 10, and overly optimistic remarks by Research in Motion's chief executive, may make the company a target of shareholder lawsuits.
abstract: Several securities law experts say the delay in the BlackBerry 10, and overly optimistic remarks by Research in Motion's chief executive, may make the company a target of shareholder lawsuits.

headline.main: Latest Delay for BlackBerry Could Lead to Lawsuits
